overview.title: Platform governance cockpit
overview.subtitle: The Admin workspace surfaces live insights, role coverage, and rollout controls tailored to the stewardship remit.

user_governance.title: User governance
user_governance.description: Review memberships, enforce MFA, and audit high-sensitivity roles in one pane of glass.
user_governance.description_detail: Launch the directory for detailed controls.

feature_rollouts.title: Feature rollouts
feature_rollouts.description: Toggle persona previews and beta pathways to coordinate phased releases with confidence.

security_posture.title: Security posture
security_posture.description: Review incidents, guardrails, and audit logs tailored for the admins' stewardship remit.
security_posture.description_detail: Confirm safeguards before adjusting privileged access.

live_insights_preview.title: Live insights preview
live_insights_preview.description: Streamlined metrics keep admins oriented before diving into the full console.

errors.error_message: We couldn't reach the governance analytics service.

incident_timeline.title: Incident timeline
incident_timeline.description: Automated crawlers and manual escalations surfaced these events for review.
incident_timeline.no_incidents_description: Uptime has held steady. Keep proactive alerts armed as safeguards.

live_alerting.title: Live alerting
live_alerting.description: Channel routing and thresholds designed for the admin governance guardrails.

persona_impact.title: Persona impact pulse
persona_impact.description: Cross-role snapshots highlight how governance decisions ripple through the platform.

events_review.title: Event Review
events_review.subtitle: Review and approve events submitted by members

awaiting_approval.title: Events Awaiting Approval
awaiting_approval.description: Review these events and approve them to make them public

recently_reviewed.title: Recently Reviewed Events
recently_reviewed.description: Events that have been recently approved or published

all_caught_up.title: All caught up!
all_caught_up.description: There are no events pending approval at this time.

dialog.approve_description: Are you sure you want to approve "{{eventName}}"? This will make the event publicly visible.
dialog.reject_description: Are you sure you want to reject "{{eventName}}"? The organizer will need to make changes and resubmit.

hardcoded_strings.error_updating_event: An error occurred while updating the event

user_directory.title: User governance
user_directory.subtitle: Track membership coverage, role assignments, and MFA enforcement for your compliance lens.

role_summary.title: Role Summary
role_summary.description: Overview of all system roles and their assignment counts

current_assignments.title: Current Role Assignments
current_assignments.description: Audit log of who has access, when it was granted, and by whom.

assign_role.title: Assign a Role
assign_role.description: Search for a user and grant them a role. Scoped roles require either a team or event context.

hints.team_scope: Use for assigning Team Admin. Leave blank for global roles.
hints.event_scope: Use for assigning Event Admin. Leave blank for global roles.
hints.expiration: Optional — leave blank for no expiration.

errors.service_unavailable: The user directory service is temporarily unavailable.
errors.load_role_management_data_failed: Failed to load role management data

remove_assignment.title: Remove role assignment
remove_assignment.description: This will revoke "{{roleName}}" from {{userName}}. This action cannot be undone.

delete_user.title: Permanently Delete User
delete_user.warning: This action is permanent, irreversible, and potentially catastrophic.
delete_user.warning_text: WARNING: Deleting {{userName}} ({{userEmail}}) will cascade delete all associated data including games, events, campaigns, memberships, and potentially impact other players who are part of these activities.
delete_user.warning_description: Deleting {{name}} ({{email}}) will cascade delete all associated data including games, events, campaigns, memberships, and potentially impact other players who are part of these activities.

sections.data_to_delete_title: Data that will be permanently deleted:

data_to_delete.games: Game master status and games created

sections.impact_description: If this user is a Game Master, their games may be affected and players could lose access to ongoing campaigns. If this user is an event organizer, registered participants may lose their event access.

data_to_delete.title: Data that will be permanently deleted:
items: Game master status and games created

impact_on_others.title: Impact on other users:
impact_on_others.description: If this user is a Game Master, their games may be affected and players could lose access to ongoing campaigns. If this user is an event organizer, registered participants may lose their event access.

social_audits.title: Social Audits
social_audits.description: Admin-only view of follow/block actions for moderation.

security_center.title: Security posture
security_center.subtitle: Steward safeguards for the governance console
security_center.description: Track platform defenses, guide incident review, and confirm that privileged controls respect admins' need for auditable guardrails.

critical_safeguards.title: Critical safeguards
critical_safeguards.description: Confirm platform-wide controls before enabling or disabling access for privileged personas.

active_incidents.title: Active incidents
active_incidents.description: Prioritize mitigations that shield visitor, player, and operations trust while admins monitor the console.

compliance_checklist.title: Compliance checklist
compliance_checklist.description: Sequence the next best actions so audits stay fast and defensible for admins.

privileged_action_log.title: Privileged action log
privileged_action_log.description: Review the latest manual and automated changes to confirm audit readiness.

labels.score_calculated_across_pillars: Score calculated across identity, infrastructure, and audit pillars.

status_indicators.no_unresolved_incidents: No unresolved incidents require attention right now.

messages.could_not_retrieve_governance_safeguards: We could not retrieve governance safeguards. Refresh the page or contact the platform engineering team.
messages.no_recent_privileged_changes: No recent privileged changes have been recorded in this window.

controls.last_reviewed_by: Last reviewed {{timeAgo}} by {{user}}. Next review in {{days}} days.

dialog.enable_description: Confirm the safeguard is ready before enabling it for all privileged personas.
dialog.disable_description: Disabling this control removes real-time guardrails. Capture justification for the audit trail.
dialog.provide_context: Provide context for the audit log so we can trace stewardship decisions.
dialog.confirm_enable_safeguard: Confirm the safeguard is ready before enabling it for all privileged personas.
dialog.confirm_disable_control: Disabling this control removes real-time guardrails. Capture justification for the audit trail.
dialog.document_why_change_necessary: Document why this change is necessary, the expected impact, and mitigation steps.

validation.min_12_characters: Please include at least 12 characters so the rationale is audit-ready.

hardcoded_strings.could_not_retrieve_governance_safeguards: We could not retrieve governance safeguards. Refresh the page or contact the platform engineering team.
hardcoded_strings.last_reviewed_by_next_review: Last reviewed {{timeAgo}} by {{user}}. Next review in {{days}} days.
hardcoded_strings.no_unresolved_incidents_require_attentio: No unresolved incidents require attention right now.
hardcoded_strings.no_recent_privileged_changes_recorded: No recent privileged changes have been recorded in this window.
hardcoded_strings.confirm_safeguard_ready_before_enabling: Confirm the safeguard is ready before enabling it for all privileged personas.
hardcoded_strings.disabling_control_removes_guardrails: Disabling this control removes real-time guardrails. Capture justification for the audit trail.
hardcoded_strings.provide_context_for_audit_log: Provide context for the audit log so we can trace stewardship decisions.
hardcoded_strings.document_why_change_necessary: Document why this change is necessary, the expected impact, and mitigation steps.
hardcoded_strings.please_include_at_least_12_characters: Please include at least 12 characters so the rationale is audit-ready.

console.title: Feature rollout console
console.description: Manage local overrides for experiments and persona previews without touching production environment variables.

shared_inbox.label: Workspace shared inbox
shared_inbox.description: Toggles the shared inbox experience across player, ops, GM, and admin workspaces.

collaboration.label: Cross-persona collaboration workspace
collaboration.description: Controls access to the collaboration workspace for role-based dashboards.

empty_state.title: No feature flags discovered
empty_state.description: Add a flag key to manage overrides or define environment variables prefixed with VITE_FLAG_.

error.title: Feature flags unavailable
error.description: We couldn't read the platform flag registry.
